summary: This is a legal amendment to Jeffrey Epstein's 2001 Trust Two, removing Henry Jarecki as successor co-Trustee and replacing him with Darren K. Indyke, Joseph Pagano, and Lawrence Newman. The document is signed by Epstein and notarized by Lauren J. Kwintner.

keyFacts: Jeffrey Epstein removed Henry Jarecki from a key financial role as successor co-Trustee of his 2001 Trust Two in 2007.
Epstein replaced Jarecki with three new successor co-Trustees: Darren K. Indyke, Joseph Pagano, and Lawrence Newman.
This document shows Epstein actively managing his financial and trust structures, making significant changes to his fiduciary team.
The trust had been previously amended and restated in 2002 and further amended in 2004, indicating ongoing management.
The document was notarized by Lauren J. Kwintner, a Notary Public in New York.
